meaningMnemonic: This <radical>cross</radical> is the symbol for the number <kanji>ten</kanji>. A good way to remember this is to think about all the religions that have crosses and also important sets of tens.
readingMnemonic: This cross in particular has <kanji>ten</kanji> <reading>jew</reading>els (じゅう) on it. Two on each arm and two in the middle. That's ten jewels!
